mapper.select: SELECT sum(IF(shop.from_inner_outer=1,1,0)) innerCount, sum(IF(shop.from_inner_outer=1,0,1)) outerCount FROM t_task_base taskTb inner join t_shop_info shop on shop.userid=taskTb.create_by and shop.del_flag=0 where taskTb.effectdate BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and taskTb.del_flag=0

SELECT sum(IF(shop.from_inner_outer=1,1,0)) innerLinkCount, sum(IF(shop.from_inner_outer=1,0,1)) outerLinkCount FROM t_task_base taskTb inner join t_shop_info shop on shop.userid=taskTb.create_by and shop.del_flag=0 inner join t_my_task_detail myTask on myTask.taskid=taskTb.id where myTask.receivingdate BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and myTask.del_flag=0 and taskTb.del_flag=0

select sum(zereLinkCount) zereLinkCount,sum(zereTaskCount) zereTaskCount from ( SELECT count(*) zereLinkCount,0 zereTaskCount FROM t_my_task_detail myTask inner join t_task_base taskTb on myTask.taskid=taskTb.id and taskTb.presentdeposit=0 and taskTb.del_flag=0 where myTask.receivingdate BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and myTask.del_flag=0 union all SELECT 0 zereLinkCount ,count(DISTINCT taskTb.id) zereTaskCount FROM t_my_task_detail myTask inner join t_task_base taskTb on myTask.taskid=taskTb.id and taskTb.presentdeposit=0 and taskTb.del_flag=0 where myTask.receivingdate BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and myTask.del_flag=0 )tb

select sum(case when isdouble>1 then 1 else 0 end) doubleLinkCount, sum(case when isdouble=1 then 1 else 0 end) singleLinkCount from ( SELECT count(*) isdouble FROM t_my_task_detail t inner join t_buyer_info i on t.buyerid = i.userid and i.del_flag=0 WHERE t.receivingdate BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and t.del_flag=0 GROUP BY i.userid, t.storename, t.mytaskid ) tb
select ifnull(sum(rechargedeposit),0) from t_finance_recharge where del_flag = 0 and create_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
select sum(ifnull(AvailableDeposit,0)) from t_shop_info where del_flag=0

select 'todayFreezing' as dataType,ifnull(sum(totalprice),0) totalMoney from t_task_base where create_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and del_flag=0 union all SELECT 'todayCommission' as dataType,ifnull(sum(tb.presentdeposit),0) totalMoney FROM t_my_task_detail td inner join t_my_task mt on mt.id=td.mytaskid and mt.del_flag=0 inner join t_task_base tb on tb.id=td.taskid and tb.del_flag=0 where td.create_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and td.del_flag=0 union all SELECT 'activePayMoney' as dataType, ifnull(sum(pays),0) totalMoney FROM t_my_task_detail td where td.create_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and td.del_flag=0

select sum(problemTaskCount) 'problemTaskCount',sum(problemTaskLinkCount) 'problemTaskLinkCount' FROM( SELECT count(DISTINCT qt.shop_task_id) 'problemTaskCount',0 'problemTaskLinkCount' FROM t_apply_task_buyer qt where qt.handle_method=2 and qt.apply_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and qt.del_flag=0 union all SELECT 0 'problemTaskCount',count(qt.shop_task_id) 'problemTaskLinkCount' FROM t_apply_task_buyer qt where qt.handle_method=2 and qt.apply_time BETWEEN #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and qt.del_flag=0 )tb

SELECT id,atime,dtime,begining_balance,ending_balance,total_recharge_deposit,today_freezing,today_commission,active_pay_money, task_total_count,internal_task_count,outer_task_count,nternal_task_ratio,outer_task_ratio,internal_task_link_count,outer_task_link_count, internal_task_link_ratio,outer_task_link_ratio,zero_commission_task_count,zero_commission_task_link_count,total_task_link_count, single_task_link_count,double_task_link_count,single_task_link_ratio,double_task_link_ratio,problem_task_count,problem_task_link_count, shop_revoke_task_count,buyer_task_income, create_by,create_date,update_by,update_date,remarks,del_flag FROM t_day_report WHERE del_flag = 0 and atime=#{queryAtime} limit 0,1

SELECT id,atime,dtime,begining_balance,ending_balance,total_recharge_deposit,today_freezing,today_commission,active_pay_money, task_total_count,internal_task_count,outer_task_count,nternal_task_ratio,outer_task_ratio,internal_task_link_count,outer_task_link_count, internal_task_link_ratio,outer_task_link_ratio,zero_commission_task_count,zero_commission_task_link_count,total_task_link_count, single_task_link_count,double_task_link_count,single_task_link_ratio,double_task_link_ratio,problem_task_count,problem_task_link_count, shop_revoke_task_count,buyer_task_income, create_by,create_date,update_by,update_date,remarks,del_flag FROM t_day_report WHERE del_flag = 0 and atime #{beginDate} and #{endDate} order by atime desc

SELECT sum(begining_balance) beginingBalance, sum(ending_balance) endingBalance,sum(total_recharge_deposit) totalRechargeDeposit, sum(today_freezing) todayFreezing,sum(today_commission) todayCommission,sum(active_pay_money) activePayMoney, sum(task_total_count) taskTotalCount,sum(internal_task_count) internalTaskCount,sum(outer_task_count) outerTaskCount, sum(internal_task_link_count) internalTaskLinkCount,sum(outer_task_link_count) outerTaskLinkCount,sum(zero_commission_task_count) zeroCommissionTaskCount, sum(zero_commission_task_link_count) zeroCommissionTaskLinkCount,sum(total_task_link_count) totalTaskLinkCount, sum(single_task_link_count) singleTaskLinkCount,sum(double_task_link_count) doubleTaskLinkCount, sum(problem_task_count) problemTaskCount,sum(problem_task_link_count) problemTaskLinkCount, sum(shop_revoke_task_count) shopRevokeTaskCount FROM t_day_report WHERE del_flag = 0 and atime between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} limit 0,1
